Html:
Hi,
When playing song in NAudio there is a small stuck(jerk) when minimize and maximize the application or any window in the system.

Is there any problem with my system configuration.

Please tell the solution for that.

Thanks in Advance

Regards,
Hinshin
I think this happens because a garbage collection gets triggered. Are you working with low buffer sizes? Longer audio buffers may allow playback to continue uninterrupted

Hi,
How i increase the buffer size.

Regards,
Hinshin

Hi Sir, 
   Please tell me How i increase the buffer size.
Thanks in Advance
Regards,
Hinshin
what output model are you using? Most of them contain a BufferSize property

Hi Sir,
    When I play song in NAudio Demo(Audio File Playback) and press minimize and maximize button continuously, it will stuck (small jerk) and it playing.
Thanks in Advance.
Regards,
Hinshin
As I said before, I think this is the garbage collector running, and interrupting playback. Not a lot can be done, except perhaps work with larger buffer sizes.

Hi Sir,
   Thanks for your response, I was using WaveOut as output, please tell me, how to increase buffer size...
What is the Average Buffer Size for WaveOut.
Thanks & Regards,
Hinshin
you can get or set buffer size on the WaveOut object. It's a public property
